eligibility: Candidates must have passed Class 12 (10+2) or equivalent examination with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of Chemistry/Biotechnology/Biology/Technical Vocational subjects. Detailed eligibility criteria are specified in the official information bulletin.
negativeMarking: Yes (1 mark deducted for each incorrect answer in MCQs)
examFrequency: Twice a year (January and April sessions)

faqs.question: What is the mode of JEE Main exam?
faqs.answer: JEE Main is conducted as a Computer Based Test (CBT) for all papers except the Drawing Test of B.Arch., which is conducted in Pen and Paper mode.
